kpi.name: RNC_548a

kpi_info.title: RRC CONNECTION DROPS DURING INTER SYST HHO CAUSED BY DL DPCH PWR NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC connection drops during inter-system handover caused by downlink DPCH power for NRT.
